description: line drawing of head and torso of a woman seen in profile from PL, looking down at a book; woman's PR hand beneath her PL elbow
marks:
Signature and Date

see Signed LLC, in pencil: [SCHIELE / EGON / 09.]
provenance: W. Ketterer Auktion, Hamburg, 14 May 1975, lot 1748; (John C. Stoller & Co, Minneapolis, 1975-'). MIA Benefit Art  Auction, sold for IOOO in 1978 to Drake; Harry M. Drake, St. Paul, 1978-2012; Estate of Harry M. Drake, bequeathed to MIA, 2013
title: Woman Reading
